title: Bitbit.cash
description: Bitbit is a free digital money wallet app for your smartphone that lets you carry cash or bitcoin, send and receive money, and more. Available on iOS and Android, anyone can start using SCI’s services in one easy to use app.

title: Buybitcoin.ph
description: The Philippine’s first Bitcoin exchange - Buy and Sell bitcoins, fast and easy.

title: Citadax
description: A liquidity platform component focused on cryptocurrency trading in Southeast Asia with a very secure, user-friendly and stable exchange at the center.

title: Mazaya
description: “Mazaya” program, from “Riyadh Airports”, offers a diverse package of services to passengers travelling through King Khalid International Airport, which will greatly enhance the leisure and comfort of your travelling experience. These specialized services have been carefully designed to maximize the joy of travelling for your entire journey, from the moment you leave your home, until you return. With “Mazaya” program, you can enjoy integrated care for you and your family through a variety of options; starting from the “Mazaya” annual membership to selected services, depending on your needs.

title: LinkU
description:
LinkU connects you with the most experienced, skilled and professional premium businesses to complete simple & complicated tasks. Any Job. Any Place. Any Time.

Mishaps occur, problems arise and things need updating in everyone’s life. But in our busy day-to-day lives, we all struggle to find the best and most reliable Aussie business to lend a helping hand when we need it most.

LinkU is here to make it fast and easy to connect with the best businesses in each industry.

Here, service providers are registered, certified, backed by insurance and ready to provide you with the highest level of service. Best of all, LinkU rewards businesses and customers alike with exclusive rewards and benefits.

title: Realtyview
description:
Offer Management for Realtors
Manage your Clients, Listings, and Offers. With RealtyView, you
can easily send, receive, and manage offers in one, innovative platform.

title: EPA
description:
Expertfolio is a multi-module online portfolio for medical training. The system is built up of separate modules (resident portfolio containing form submissions and EPA, ultrasound portfolio, medical devices multimedia uploads). Depending on what modules the user is paying for, these modules will be enabled in his
own Expertfolio.
